SANDBOX/AddToolMenuCategories.description: This hook is used to add new categories to spawnmenu tool tabs.

SANDBOX/AddToolMenuTabs.description: This hook is used to add new tool tabs to spawnmenu.

SANDBOX/CanDrive.description: Called when a player attempts to drive a prop via Prop Drive

SANDBOX/CanProperty.description: Controls if a property can be used or not.

SANDBOX/CanTool.description: Called when a player attempts to fire their tool gun. Return true to specifically allow the attempt, false to block it.

SANDBOX/ContentSidebarSelection.description: Called when player selects an item on the spawnmenu sidebar at the left.

SANDBOX/ContextMenuCreated.description: Called when the context menu is created.

SANDBOX/PersistenceLoad.description: Called when persistent props are loaded.

SANDBOX/PersistenceSave.description: Called when persistent props are saved.

SANDBOX/PlayerGiveSWEP.description: Called when a player attempts to give themselves a weapon from the Q menu. ( Left mouse clicks on an icon )

SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnEffect.description: Called to ask if player allowed to spawn a particular effect or not.

SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnNPC.description: Called to ask if player allowed to spawn a particular NPC or not.

SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnObject.description: Called to ask whether player is allowed to spawn any objects.

SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnProp.description: Called when a player attempts to spawn a prop from the Q menu.

SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnRagdoll.description: Called when a player attempts to spawn a ragdoll from the Q menu.

SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnSENT.description: Called when a player attempts to spawn an Entity from the Q menu.

SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnSWEP.description: Called when a player attempts to spawn a weapon from the Q menu. ( Mouse wheel clicks on an icon )

SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnVehicle.description: Called to ask if player allowed to spawn a particular vehicle or not.

SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnedEffect.description: Called after the player spawned an effect.

SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnedNPC.description: Called after the player spawned an NPC.

SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnedProp.description: Called when a player has successfully spawned a prop from the Q menu.

SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnedRagdoll.description: Called after the player spawned a ragdoll.

SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnedSENT.description: Called after the player has spawned a scripted entity.

SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnedSWEP.description: Called after the player has spawned a scripted weapon.

SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnedVehicle.description: Called after the player spawned a vehicle.

SANDBOX/PopulatePropMenu.description: This hook makes the engine load the spawnlist text files. It calls

SANDBOX/SpawnMenuEnabled.description: If false is returned then the spawn menu is never created. This saves load times if your mod doesn't actually use the spawn menu for any reason.

SANDBOX/SpawnMenuOpen.description: Called when spawnmenu is trying to be opened.
